alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cherokee; Cleburne; Etowah; St. Clair; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 7:55PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Talladega, Calhoun, Etowah, northeastern St. Clair, northeastern Cleburne and Cherokee Counties through 915 PM CST... At 754 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Reece City to near Odenville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Anniston, Jacksonville, Rainbow City, Attalla, Piedmont, Hokes Bluff, Odenville, Centre, Heflin, Cedar Bluff, Forney, West End-Cobb Town, Centre Municipal Airport, Cobb Town, Fort McClellan, Saks, Lincoln, Glencoe and Weaver. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Cherokee; Cleburne; Etowah; St. Clair; Talladega
